text: Miroslav Jíška (born 4 October 1933) is a Czech rower who represented Czechoslovakia. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's coxless four where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Czechoslovak male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Czechoslovakia Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:People from Litoměřice Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Miroslav Jíška
